javadoc: Task to paste files at given destination folder.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: isCut
params.comment: boolean flag, true means source nodes were cut instead of copied.

methods.name: pasteFile
methods.comment: Paste the given file at the folder represented by destNode.

methods.javadoc: Paste the given folder at destNode.
methods.name: pasteFolder
methods.comment: Paste the given folder at destNode.

methods.name: copyFile
methods.comment: Copy a file into a new folder.

methods.javadoc: Copy the given folder and all of its contents into a new parent folder.
methods.name: copyFolder
methods.comment: Copy the given folder and all of its contents into a new parent folder.

methods.name: moveFile
methods.comment:
Move a file into a folder.
 
 Displays a error dialog if there was an exception

methods.name: moveFolder
methods.comment:
Move the given folder and all of its contents into a new parent folder.
 
 Displays a error dialog if there was an exception

name: PasteFileTask
comment: Task to paste files at given destination folder.
